data.name: Bunny Hop : Eggstreme
data.detailed_description:
Bunny Hop : Eggstreme is a 3D platformer based on strafing, surfing, and many more unique movement mechanics. Beat your own records or your friends on the leaderboard, collect hidden easter eggs, run through biome-themed levels. Play online with your friends or alone, find new routes or just enjoy the view.

Features

  • Bunny Hop
  • Surf
  • Multiplayer
  • Replays
  • Global leaderboards
  • Customization
  • Easter eggs
  • More than 20 different levels
  • New maps every month
  • A lot of fun

Join us on Discord !

data.short_description: Bunny Hop : Eggstreme is a challenging 3D first-person platformer based on the famous movement feature called "bunny hop". Beat your friends, explore the world, find all the secrets this universe offers you and become the very bester bhopper the world has ever known.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
